recipes.directions:
1/2 cup of mayonnaise, 1/3 cup granulated sugar, 1/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 2 1/2 tbsp. lemon juice, 1 1/2 tbsp. white vinegar, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp pepper, For the slaw - 1 head of cabbage, 1 medium carrot, and 2 tbsp. minced onion.

Chop cabbage into chunks, and run through food processor, to make a fine chop. Combine all ingredients for dressing into a large bowl and mix well. Combine all vegetables and mix well. Pour dressing over the slaw and coat well (mix). Cover and refrigerate for AT LEAST 4 HOURS... Overnight is better.
recipes.name: KFC Coleslaw Recipe
